questions:

A) Nature and landscapes
B) Daily life and people
C) Urban street scene
D) Wildlife and animals

B) At the beach
C) On a city street
D) Inside a museum

A) A peaceful nature scene
B) A light and sign post and stickers and graffiti on it
C) A sports event
D) A family gathering

B) A building
C) A signpost with stickers
